2.0.2.name: wordpress/roban-meta-box-v01
2.0.2.description:
This Plugin is used for define customer post,page fields,for example,if you want add a select or radio field on your post page,then use it!

这是一个用于自定义post ,page 页面字段的工具,您可以通过这个工具自定义字段

About

If you have any problem or question,Fell free to email me @ robanlee@gmail.com , or visit my blog on Robanlee.com

Features

  • With ajax.
  • support select,radio text text area

功能特性

  • 使用ajax
  • 支持text,text area,select radio。
